articles.description: Oppo has unveiled Android 12-based ColorOS 12. It features Quick View cards, a 3D avatar feature called Omoji, and allows operating supported phones with a Windows 10 or 11 laptop. Oppo also revealed the names of the devices that will receive new versions of …
articles.content: Oppo has unveiled all the features of ColorOS 12, the latest version of its Android 12-based operating system. The new UI layer will come to Oppo phones as well as OnePlus phones that have been using… [+2283 chars]

articles.title: New PS5 Exclusive Is a Big Blow to Xbox - ComicBook.com
articles.description: One of PlayStation 5's recently announced exclusives is a big blow to Xbox and the Xbox Series X. Last console generation, the 'console wars' were quiet. At the time, many mistook this ceasefire as peace, but it wasn't. The PS4 is set to go down as one of the…
